DOC.brief_summary: This study compare pre- postoperative ( 6 month ) quality life pathomorphology pelvis ( MRI defecation ) STARR procedure outlet obstruction . - Trial surgical intervention
DOC.brief_title: Stapled Trans Anal Rectal Resection ( STARR ) Outlet Obstruction : Functional Morphological Outcome
